definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: terror, dread (Talm. id., cf. As. imtu, Dl:W)—´[[י]] Ge 15:12 +; [[אֵימָ֫תָה]] Ex 15:16 (cf. Ges:§ 90, 2 R. b); cstr. [[אֵימַת]] Pr 20:2; sf. [[אֵימָתִי]] Ex 23:27; [[אֵמָתִי]] Job 33:7, etc.; pl. [[אֵימִים]] Je 50:38; [[אֵמִים]] Job 20:25; [[אֵימוֹת]] Ps 55:5; sf. [[אֵמֶיךָ]] Ps 88:16; —terror, dread (mostly poet.), inspired by ´[[י]] Ex 15:16 (song in E ‖ [[פַּחַד ךָ]]) Ex 23:27 (E) De 32:25, Job 9:34, Job 13:21 cf. Job 33:7; Job 20:25, Ps 88:16 (‖[[חֲרוֹנִים ]], [[בִּעוּתִים]] v:Ps 88:17); cf. Ge 15:2 [[אֵימָה חֲשֵׁכָה גְדוֹלָה]]; occasioned by enemies Jos 2:9, Is 33:18, Ezr 3:3; by king Pr 20:2; cf. Ps 55:5 [[אֵימוֹת מָוֶת]] (‖[[יִרְאָה ]], [[רַעַד]], [[פַּלָּחוּת]] v:Ps 55:6); pred. of snorting of a war-horse Job 39:20, of teeth of crocodile Job 41:6; pl. fig. = idols (i.e. dreadful, shocking things) Je 50:38 (‖[[פּסלים ]]).
